nodes.text: The Jrade School Board presumably controlled the schools in the Jrade District of the Core World of Coruscant. In 22 BBY, the Jrade School Board was surprised to find death sticks in the possession of two students at public subadult school PSAS-5128. The school required all its students to undergo body and locker searches as a result.
The Jrade School Board only appeared in an article in Vol. 531 #53 of the in-universe website HoloNet News. The issue was released on April 25, 2002.
